body_html: I have the same problem (windows 10, tensorflow 1.11.0, tensorbard 1.11.0, tensorflow-gpu 1.9.0): saving the model weights with Saver.save() multiple times to the same file within the tensorboard logdir folder fails. As a workaround, I write them outside the tensorboard logdir folder and it works.
body_text: I have the same problem (windows 10, tensorflow 1.11.0, tensorbard 1.11.0, tensorflow-gpu 1.9.0): saving the model weights with Saver.save() multiple times to the same file within the tensorboard logdir folder fails. As a workaround, I write them outside the tensorboard logdir folder and it works.
body: I have the same problem (windows 10, tensorflow 1.11.0, tensorbard 1.11.0, tensorflow-gpu 1.9.0): saving the model weights with `Saver.save()` multiple times to the same file **within the tensorboard logdir folder** fails. As a workaround, I write them **outside the tensorboard logdir folder** and it works.
